data.title: Zagreb time zone
data.meta_description: Find cities and countries in the Europe/Zagreb time zone to calculate the world time difference.
data.text:
The time and date in this time zone is:

3:58 PM on Thursday, Aug 15, 2024

Search for a city to find the local time.

Daylight Saving Time: This time zone changed to daylight saving time (DST) at 2:00 AM on Sunday, Mar 31, 2024. The GMT offset is currently UTC/GMT +2 hours (CEST). It will change back to standard time at 3:00 AM on Sunday, Oct 27, 2024. The new GMT offset will be UTC/GMT +1 hours (CET).
